headline: Snacking Headwinds Persist: Can PepsiCo's Beverages Carry the Load?
summary: PEP faces North America snack volume pressure, but bets on permissible snacks and zero-sugar beverages to revive growth amid health shifts.

raw.headline: Snacking Headwinds Persist: Can PepsiCo's Beverages Carry the Load?
raw.summary: PEP faces North America snack volume pressure, but bets on permissible snacks and zero-sugar beverages to revive growth amid health shifts.

headline: Pepsi killed a popular cola flavor, many more coming
summary: PepsiCo has shared plans to cut about 20% of its snacks, sodas, and other products in order to appease an activist investor. Those cuts, however, have not started, and the company has not shared exactly which items will be discontinued. That does not mean that the Coca-Cola rival has not been ...

headline: PepsiCo: A Blue-Chip Dividend Aristocrat And Dividend King Ripe For Picking
summary: PepsiCo, an American multinational food, snack, and beverage corporation, is now a $191 billion (by market cap) snack and beverage giant. Read more here.
